src_original: anāttamānaso devā bhavanti bhavaneṣu ca // Suv_13.22 //  yadā hyupekṣate rājā duṣkṛtaṃ vicaretparam /  te sarve devarājāśca vakṣyanti ca parasparam // Suv_13.23 //  adhārmiko hyayaṃ rājā hyadharmapakṣamāśritaḥ /

na cireṇa hyayaṃ rājā devatāṃ kopayiṣyati // Suv_13.24 //  devatānāṃ parikopādviṣayo 'sya vinakṣyati /  śasrāṇi ca adharmaśca viṣaye 'tra bhaviṣyanti // Suv_13.25 //  śāṭhyānāṃ kalahānāṃ ca rogāṇāṃ ca samudbhavaḥ /  prakupyati ca devendra upekṣyanti ca devatāḥ // Suv_13.26 //  pralupyate ca yadrāṣṭraṃ sa nṛpaḥ śokamṛcchati /
tgt_original: 是王令其國敗生大愁惱。

src_original: iṣṭaviyogaṃ prāpnoti bhrātrā vātha sutena vā // Suv_13.27 //  (Bagchi 73)  priyabhāryāviyogo vā prāpyate duhitātha vā /
tgt_original: 兄弟姊妹眷屬妻子孤迸流離身亦亡滅。
他方惡賊侵掠其土人民飢餓多諸疾疫。

src_original: parasparaṃ hariṣyanti kulabhogaṃ dhanāni ca // Suv_13.30 //  deśe deśe haniṣyanti śastreṇa ca parasparam /
tgt_original: 諸家財產國土所有互相劫奪刀兵而死。

src_original: vivādāḥ kalahāḥ śāṭhyā bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca // Suv_13.31 //  grahaḥ praviśate rāṣṭre vyādhirbhavati dāruṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 五星諸宿違失常度諸惡疾。
